text:
时间：16:00喝酒聊天晚餐：18:00晚宴
人数： 30位
包房： VIP 大
Alexandra Fen 和 Ryan Benevides盛情邀请各位长辈和亲戚莅临★唐府私宴
地址：长宁区淞虹路938号(福缘湾-九华)2号楼5楼，乘坐一楼麦当劳右手边电梯直达5楼另外想拍照留个纪念，敬请大家- 服装女士们-裙子或者旗袍男士们-西装 夹克
联系电话： 18116087882 刘观凤 经理
trans:
Time: 16:00 Drinks and Chatting. Dinner: 18:00 Formal Banquet
Number of people: 30
Private Room: VIP Large room
Alexandra Fen and Ryan Benevides cordially invite all elders and relatives to ★ a private dinner at the House of Tang.
Address: 5th Floor, Building 2, No. 938 Songhong Road (Fuyuan Bay - Jiuhua Square), Changning District. Take the elevator on the right-hand side of the McDonald's on the first floor to the 5th floor. We want to take a group photo as a memento of the event. Kindly adhere to the suggested dress code: Ladies: Dresses or cheongsam; Gentlemen: Suits or jackets.
Tel: 18116087882 Manager Liu Guanfeng
